Blimp carried more than 600 miles across Texas amid heavy wind before it crashed near Dallas
To stream WFAA on your phone, you need the WFAA app.
Download the WFAA app
Strong winds swept through Texas over the last few days, causing damage and, in one case, sending a blimp hundreds of miles across the state.
